testcase.classname: Verify Xealei Suites > Edit Suites Page
testcase.name: To verify the buttons functionality and error validation and info messages in Edit Suite Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password................passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed And User should verify the Suite Module is working..........................passed Then User should verify suite page tab url address for suites page..........passed Then User should search the created suite...................................passed Then User should verify the Edit Suite button is working....................passed Then User should verify the Edit Suite pop up screen is displayed...........passed Then User should verify the limit error info message for Suite Name* field "Suite Name must be minimum 3 characters" in edit suite page.passed Then User should verify the Edit Suite form for mandatory "Please Enter Suite Name".passed Then User should verify duplicate validation for Suite name '"Suite Name already exists."' in edit suite page.passed Then User should verify the x icon in edit suite screen is working..........passed Then User should verify the user able to change the status as InActive and is displayed accordingly on update of Availability field in Edit screen.passed

testcase.classname: Verify Xealei Suites > Edit Suites Page
testcase.name: To verify user able to Edit/Update Suites by entering all fields also verify the 'Bread Crums' link in Edit Suite Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password................passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed And User should verify the Suite Module is working..........................passed Then User should verify suite page tab url address for suites page..........passed Then User should search the created suite...................................passed Then User should verify the Edit Suite button is working....................passed Then User should verify the Edit Suite pop up screen is displayed...........passed And User should update all fields and verify the toast message after update all fields "Saved Successfully!!" in edit Suite Page.passed Then User should verify all fields are created successsfully in edit Suite Page.passed Then User should verify the breadcrums link should be display with module suite name > selected suite name in edit suite page.passed Then User should verify after click the breadcrums link it should be return to Suite searched page in edit suite page.passed

testcase.name: To verify Xealei Login page with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Xealei login page..........................................passed When User should perform login with valid email and password................passed Then User should verify once the page is navigated to HOME_DASHBOARD successfully "Home".passed
